txt.en: You have been tasked with stopping the Tarkrîp Orcs before they collapse the mines of Writhenset.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Radhril for your reward!

'Would you accompany me on a mission, [placeholder]?

'The Free Peoples in the Wildwood have reported a group of Tarkrîp Orcs who head to the mines of Writhenset with bombs and black powder in tow. It would seem these foes seek to collapse the mines.

'If the mines of Writhenset are to ever again be safe, this group of Orcs must be removed.'
A group of Tarkrîp Orcs seeks to collapse the mines of Writhenset!\n\nYour mission is to stop the Tarkrîp Orcs before they collapse the mines of Writhenset.
At low health, monsters in this mission will attempt to end their own lives to damage and apply a fear effect to those nearby.
Your mission is to stop the Tarkrîp Orcs before they collapse the mines of Writhenset.\n\nSpeak to Radhril.
'We have done well, [placeholder]. With the mines of Writhenset once again secure, the Free Peoples will now be able to continue with their efforts beneath the Wildwood.'
